title: cc菜单和SX-Attribute的指令
author: Heikobell
txt_content: cc菜单中COMMAND添加了'sx stats'查看个人属性,但是不显示,如果从聊天框输入就会显示

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content: 你的问题就是在那个设置项后面加一行KEEP-OPEN: true

replies.author: 炫宙菌
replies.txt_content:
zt:
  NAME: '&e状态'
  COMMAND: 'op:sx stats'
  LORE:
    - '&a&l点击查看战斗状态'
  ID: 397
  SKULL-OWNER: {player}
  KEEP-OPEN: true
  DATA-VALUE: 3
  POSITION-X: 3
  POSITION-Y: 1复制代码
